actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-852.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 8336 to enhance the outdoor recreation opportunities for the people of the United States by expanding the National Park System, by providing access to and within areas of the National Park System, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 8336 (National Park System expansion).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 8336 to enhance the outdoor recreation opportunities for the people of the United States by expanding the National Park System, by providing access to and within areas of the National Park System, and for other purposes.
